title: EBSI Accredited Verifiable Attestation Record
description: Schema of an EBSI Accredited Verifiable Attestation

termsOfUse.description: Contains the terms under which the Accredited Verifiable Attestation was issued

id.description: Contains a URL that points to where more information about this instance of terms of use can be found.

type.description: Defines the type of terms of use.

credentialSubject.description: Property. Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable ID

id.description: Property. Defines the DID of the subject that is described by the Verifiable Attestation

familyName.description: Property. Defines current family name(s) of the credential subject

firstName.description: Property. Defines current first name(s) of the credential subject

dateOfBirth.description: Property. Defines date of birth of the credential subject

personalIdentifier.description: Defines the unique national identifier of the credential subject (constructed by the sending Member State in accordance with the technical specifications for the purposes of cross-border identification and which is as persistent as possible in time)

nameAndFamilyNameAtBirth.description: Property. Defines the first and the family name(s) of the credential subject at the time of their birth

placeOfBirth.description: Property. Defines the place where the credential subjectis born

currentAddress.description: Property. Defines the current address of the credential subject

gender.description: Property. Defines the gender of the credential subject
